Articles.Content:
I never did introduce myself. Well now is as good a time as any.

Greetings, I am Colonial Marine Corporal Vasquez. I have enjoyed playing the KSP game and it's been an educational run. I enjoy the mods, especially the KSO, FASA and any historical mods. I have always enjoyed space flight.

I was using the 23.5 version, and recently decided to upgrade to the 24, but now it seems my voyage is at an end. The 24, crashes on load, but hey I'm not mad, it has been a fun journey. I have tried all the fixes to no avail.

I will continue to run on the 23.5 until it no longer works. But hey, it has been a wonderful ride. Keep on shooting your Kerb's to the stars boys!

Corporal Vasquez

United States Colonial space Marines

8th Basic Marine Tactical Squad

Sulaco.

If you are experiencing crashes, take it up with the ksp support subforum. But I think I may know why you are crashing. It is most likely RAM crashes, which is caused by mods with lots of parts. The easy solution is to download the active texture management mod, or switch to ksp 64 bit.

EDIT:I was about to salute you out of respect, until I noticed it said Colonial 'space' marines.

Edited August 27, 2014 by Space_Kraken

Dual boot Linux and grab the Linux version of the game. It's a last resort thing, but works.

Welcome.
